text: I know this has been touched on before, but does anyone have their code formatter setup for CSS/HubL in VS Code dialed? I have no problems with HTML, but can't seem to get my CSS to format correctly. There's either no indentation at all, or the auto-indentor breaks the HubL.
do you have the hubl extention installed?

<@U38EZFVFE> - Sounds like you have things working pretty well on your end - Any suggestions? Do you use Prettier or Beautify, or something else? I've experimented with both, plus the Better Jinja solution and am really struggling.
Nope. just what is built into VS
if all you are working in is hubl + css then set the default for css to be that
otherwise i would keep it stock
What does your settings.json look like?
